Control Name: REL 8.1 Use runbooks for standard activities such as deployment
Control Statement: Runbooks are the predeﬁned steps used to achieve speciﬁc outcomes. Use runbooks to perform standard activities, whether done manually or automatically. Examples include deploying a workload, patching it, or making DNS modiﬁcations.

control_attributes.Control: REL 8.1 Use runbooks for standard activities such as deployment
